Abilities.Description: Doubles the Speed of the user in rain.

Moves.Name: Water Pulse
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

Moves.Name: Zen Headbutt
Moves.Description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Disable
Moves.Description: For four turns, the target will be unable to use whichever move it last used.

Moves.Name: Hypnosis
Moves.Description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall asleep.

Abilities.Name: Steam Engine
Abilities.Description: Increases the user's Speed by 6 stages if the user gets hit with a Fire-type or Water-type move.

Abilities.Name: Heatproof
Abilities.Description: Damage received by the user from Fire-type moves and the Burn status condition is reduced in half.

Abilities.Name: Flash Fire
Abilities.Description: Increases the damage from Fire-type moves by 50% if the user is hit with a Fire-type move. Once activated the user becomes immune to Fire-type attacks.

Moves.Name: Smokescreen
Moves.Description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.

Moves.Name: Mud-Slap
Moves.Description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

Moves.Name: Incinerate
Moves.Description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

Moves.Name: Smack Down
Moves.Description: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack the target. If the target is in the air, it will be knocked down to the ground.

Abilities.Name: Corrosion
Abilities.Description: The user can now poison Steel-type and Poison-type opponents.

Abilities.Name: Oblivious
Abilities.Description: The user cannot be infatuated, intimidated, or be taunted.

Moves.Name: Ember
Moves.Description: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Moves.Name: Poison Tail

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: The user lower's the opponent's Attack by one stage whenever it enters the battlefield.

Abilities.Name: Moxie
Abilities.Description: The user's Attack is increased by one stage whenever it knocks out another Pokemon.

Abilities.Name: Anger Point
Abilities.Description: The user gets their Attack stat increased by 6 stages after receiving a critical hit.

Abilities.Description: The user is protected from critical hits.

Abilities.Description: Protects the user from the effects of Weather and Powder Moves.

Moves.Description: The user cuts the target with sharp shells to inflict damage. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Moves.Name: Tackle

Abilities.Name: Sticky Hold
Abilities.Description: The user's Held item cannot be taken by other Pokemon.

Abilities.Name: Storm Drain
Abilities.Description: The user draws in all Water-type moves. Water-type moves cannot damage the user but instead will boost its Special Attack by one stage.

Abilities.Name: Sand Force
Abilities.Description: Increases the damage of the user's Ground-type, Rock-type, and Steel-type moves by 30% during a Sandstorm and the user takes no damage from the Sandstorm.

Moves.Name: Water Pulse
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

Moves.Name: Ancient Power
Moves.Description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. This may also boost all the user's stats at once.

Moves.Name: Clear Smog
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are eliminated.

Abilities.Name: Rivalry
Abilities.Description: The user's Attack and Special Attack is increased by 25% if the opponent is the same gender but is decreased by 25% instead if the opponent is the opposite gender.

Abilities.Name: Intimidate

Abilities.Name: Truant

Abilities.Description: The user restores up to 1/3 of its max HP when switched out of battle.
